message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product for $1200000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the value of your product, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1000000 for it. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to consider a compromise. I am now offering the product for $1100000. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget. I hope this proposal is more acceptable and we can reach a satisfactory agreement.
